channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Clergy (Neutral Support) and The Exorcist (Unseen Support)
channel.description:
The Clergy (Neutral Support)
Converted Classes: Unseen (The Exorcist) Cult (The Ritualist)
Objective: Survive to the End
Passives: God's Love: Occupation Immune Holy Trial: Bleeding and Nightshade Immune
Day Abilities: Harmonious Love: The Assassin and The Cult Leader cannot use their Day Abilities (2 Uses)
Night Abilities: Holy Ward: Barrier and Heal a Player. (3 Uses) Transcendent Meditation: Prevents all visits to you (3 Uses)
Drawing Idea: A peaceful, smiling monk, standing, with his arms folded in front of him.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- The Exorcist (Unseen Support)
Converted Class: The Clergy
Objective: Same as The Unseen
Passives: God's Blessing: Occupy Immune Once Heart of Darkness: Visits will not be seen
Day Abilities: Curse: If a player votes for a member of The Unseen, they will appear as a member of The Unseen for the night (3 Uses)
Night Abilities: Unholy Communion: Heal and Barrier all members of The Unseen. (1 Use) Confessional: Learn the class of a player. Bypasses Prevention and Occupation, but players visiting your target will know The Exorcist visited the target (3 Uses)
Drawing Idea: Angry monk, holding a cross facing the player, blood tips the top and the bottom of the cross
Anything I should Tweak? Let me know!
[Additional Information: A. Does not spawn with The Alchemist B. When a Clergy is present, there will only be 1 physician in game]

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Clergy (Neutral Support) and The Exorcist (Unseen Support)
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Why would a neutral have BD goals? Make it BD.

Why is it immune to bleeding/poison/occupation?

Transcendent Meditation is actually a good support ability. Maybe have more uses, but not learn attempted visitors (since that’s investigative)

Heart of Darkness is arbitrary Observer counter.

I like Curse, although it might be more of an Offensive ability.

Unholy Communion is a good protective ability.

Confessional makes all Clergy claims suspicious, and is pretty weak anyways. Marshal does that with no downsides. Also Investigative.
